visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing monthly website traffic trends with seasonal variation using datetime axis formatting
visualization_explanation: The dataset represents a 12-month time series (univariate, continuous) tracking website visitors. Synthetic data combines a 15% YTD growth trend (μ=23.4k, σ=5.2k) with seasonal peaks in June/December, maintaining domain-appropriate ranges for mid-sized websites. The spline chart minimizes visual noise while emphasizing trend direction, adhering to Tufte's principles by maximizing data-ink ratio through marker removal. Color choices (seagreen/slate) follow Cairo's preattentive processing guidelines, creating immediate distinction from the original example's default palette. Axis formatting uses D3-style pattern ('{value}k') for quantitative clarity, with datetime labels ensuring proper temporal interpretation.
